name: @workspace/testing
description: Comprehensive real-world testing infrastructure for PAPI code generation validation - 9 validation layers with negative testing

scripts.test:quick: tsx -e "import { TestRunner } from './src/test-runner'; new TestRunner().runQuickValidation().then(r => console.log('Results:', r))"
scripts.test:negative: tsx -e "import { validatorValidationTest } from './src/validator-validation-test'; validatorValidationTest.runValidatorValidationSuite().then(r => console.log('Validator Tests:', r.passed ? 'PASSED' : 'FAILED'))"
